column5: I finished up all the work I had yesterday so today I'm packing and leaving first thing tomorrow morning for Lakair, it's finally here !! Sadly I have to be back in the big smoke for friday evening but I plan on making the most of my three days. Looking forward to seeing all the regulars and some new faces as well.  If anyone needs a ride up let me know, I know, kinda last minute but I wasn't sure of my departure date til now.
Good Luck Graham!
Big Dumb Cook Allan Rainville no cabin or tent ( live here already ) have boat  Hope everyone ejoyed the food! Have a great time
Allan, shouldn't you be doing dishes or planning supper around this time?   (After that comment I think I'll let someone taste my food for me while I'm up there.)
FYI - Salad is not food... it's simply a promissory note of food to come! HH
Nope !  We can talk about happenings but not name names...
Tom, Tom............real names are not important. Everything becomes a blurr after the first sip or two...   You won't feel a thing!

Absolutely no way, is there going to be much of that stuff passing down my gullet!!!!!!!!!   If any. I drink beer, thats it, thats all. I don't drink champagne at new years, hate hard liquor, don't drink shooters bought for me on my birthday(subsequently, no one buys them for me any more, lol), and only occasionally drink wine at family dinners, special events, or weddings.  Ahhhhhhhh, the old "what happens at Lakair, stays at Lakair" routine,  I just might need that after my first trip there. Hope not though.  And, I think I already know who that "lad" is anyways.
That "Get Out of Jail Free Card" may come in very handy!!!  It's all aboot fun!!! and there's no shortage of that there!!!

Yes, I know that the prime meaning of this event is to have fun, and lots of it. Fishing is the reason for the event, but not the ultimate reason. It's a g2g of ONFC members in one place, at one time, to be able to have fun, get to know new, and old members face to face who will in all likelyhood not ever get the chance to again, at least many of them. Some will be lifers at this event, others, it will be their one and only time.  Still concerned that you somehow know about "fuzzy handcuffs" though?????????  And, the "New Meat" comment a page or so back is STILL in the forefront of my mind.  (darned banjo music is still there also).

The trick, Tom, is to learn the attendees real names first. PM them if you have to. There's nothing worse than meeting people a few at a time....you see three guys coming up the trail, you extend your hand and with a smile say "Hi, I'm Tom, you must be Sammy Smooth Balls and Lick My Armpit, Phat Bassturd."

Ya, OK, but I would extend my hand and say "Hi, I am tjsa"  to anyone down there, OFC'r or not, then they would be in the same boat as I am, knowing only board names.  But, thats OK, who cares. I will be on holidays, if Lew isn't really Lew, or Sammy Smoothballs isn't all that smooth, wherever,  it's just a board name, like yours is Roy, even if it is not your real first name, who the heck cares.   You are fishing me right, to find out what my board handle "tjsa" exactly means. You came close once, in chat, I will reveal it to you when I meet you, face to face. That is a promise.
Haven't seen SSB around for a while. Is he (oops sorry she) coming up to Lakair?

It's been close to forever since I checked out the site.  I thought I might as well since the Lakair gig must be coming up. Holy sheet !!!  Everything's new and all fancy schmancy.  Hell, it's taking forever for a technopeasant like me just to figure out how to work the damn thing.   I'll bet ol' TJ must be hauling in the loot from showing Sea Doo videos and stuff.  I'll bet these days he's driving around in a V 12 Masarati SUV and out trolling with two of those spiffy new 300 HP Yamaha 4 strokes on the back of his 16 footer.  I can't believe all the newbies who by now must mostly be oldbies.  I thought by now that maybe most of the oldbies would be bored yacking about stupid fish every night and moved on to check out more important things like the hot new porn sites out there or the latest interesting postings on www.rotten.com.  It's good to see that Roy's still around.  He looks so old I thought he'd probably be dead by now.  Living out in the boonies north of the 1,000 islands I still can't get high speed so I'm stuck with snail speed until Sympatico gets caught bribing the CRTC   to not forcing them to provide modern service to this area.  In the meantime it takes forever to download OFC so unless I fork over a bundle to Ripnet, a local wireless ISP in Brockville to bring me into the 21st century there's no point in dropping in to say hello too often.  I might just sign up with them even though by the time they've hooked up all the necessary hardware onto the roof, my house will look like the USS Ronald Reagan aircraft carrier in the middle of the woods.  Hey GaryV!!!  Is that your black lab in the picture?
Nice to see/hear from ya Dave.  Yer still alive and kicking,but that post was way below yer best.LOL Hope alls well with you and the political world you live in.
Dave,you still have them PJ,s  Hope all is well.  Steve
I still remember those sexy thangs.LOL
Good to see ya back for a cameo Dave.Would like to meet ya in person at Lakair one day.Dont be a stranger here and come off of some of the $ for a high speed connection! Joe
Sweet Jesus!   I thought for sure he was dead.  I'm happy to know I'm wrong.  Hi Dave.   Stick around and share your insights.

Talk about a ghost from the past. Afrter all this time working you still havent raised the coin for a faster connection??? I would send you a quarter to help but it would cost me a dollar to do it. Hope you can make it to lake air.   Art

Hi ya... Canadave... glad to see you're still out there... and still have the same old wit....!  looking forward to seeing all the boys and girls.. in a few days... not sure that leslie and I are ready for this... but what the heck!... its always fun...  the fishing has been very good this spring... should be no problem having a fish fry... just have to clean them damn bones out of the pike!  the capt.
Here's an idea Kevin. Keep all the Pike you catch, and clean 'em for our Fish Fry. We will replace them for you, ready to clean for the next bunch of misfits that come to your Lodge!

.... ohhh boy... its coming FAST!!!  This year... im gonna personally supervise the pike cleaning to make sure there are no bones... last years were a bit boney.....  Supper may be later... but it will be bone free!!
You Da Man T.J.!!!
Its still pot luck I assume, everyone bring a salad again????  Joey
Real men don't eat salad.........
Unless their wife made it.
Ah yes, absolutely right. I guess that's why they pay you the management fees Roy............
Sorry you can't make it Gary, hope you're feeling better soon.  Maureen
Sorry I'll miss you Gary !After waiting all this time to go, I'd be pretty well ticked off too. Tough luck,but your health comes first EH  !!!!!
AAAAWWWW   MAN!!!!!!  GaryV ain't gonna be there?????????   Thats it, I  ain't showin' up either,

Hey glen looks like our comic relief is trying to slip out......... better get the rope we got us a little sidetrip before we get to fishin.......   ....  ......  ...... heeeeeeereee  Toooommmmmmmmyyyyeeeee    Art
I was goin' to bring a pair of "fuzzy" handcuffs to use one him anyway, jus' looks like we gotta use'm sooner than planned...
Heard from Don(DEG) yesterday .He and Ruth will be there from Monday till Monday. Joe
Thanks Joe, see you guys soon...  Maureen

QUOTE(tjsa @ Jun 1 2007, 07:18 PM) * AAAAWWWW MAN!!!!!!  GaryV ain't gonna be there????????? Thats it, I ain't showin' up either, laugh.gif        OK, OK, OK, OK,  NOW HOLD IT JUST ONE GALL DARN MINUTE HERE!!!!!!!!!!  FUZZY HANDCUFFS???????????????????  I had to google that, and for sure, I ain't the sharpest tool in the shed, buuuuuutttttt ????????????????????????  You are "guys", right?????    I AIN'T FEELIN' VERY SECURE RIGHT NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!   (and where is this BANJO music comin' from)
You don't wanna know where the banjo music comes from....
He'll show up just to see if we're really as sick and twisted in person...and boy is he in for a surprise.....
Not just Tom, are there any campsites available at another lodge !

Hi guys,  Joe tells me you have been looking for us.  I didn't even know I was lost ... damn old age thing.  First let me say that the blackflies were biting well this last weekend.  Just ask Ruth.  They are getting ready for the tender southern meat.  Tom ... glad to see you are coming this year, looking forward to finally getting to meet you. Just read who you are  bunking with.  My deepest sympathy!  I noticed they forgot to tell you to bring a white shirt.  Joe and Art can explain it.  Don't ask GCD about it, he doesn't own a shirt. lol  13 days to go for us.  Can't wait.  Looking forward to seeing everyone.  Gary, I guess I will just have to stop in and see you and Amy on our way south.  Deg
I got you covered on the white shirt Tom I have a few extra for people who fish in the boat.   Art

Tom is some pretty stout material but if we finish him off before we leave I guess we can look up our old buddy The Craftyprince.  Hey Glen bring 2 bottles of shine I think we got us another volunteer to amuse us if the fishin is slow.   Art
These are the ones from last year Tom, they were well used until TJ stole them...........
Soooooo,           if TJ stole 'em, why do you have a picture of them??????????
now I aint one to say anything (blaitent lie) but is that a nitestand next to the masterbed they are sitting on John?????    Art
Well, last time I saw 'em, TJ was the wearin' 'em, GCD had that "glint" in his eye..........I didn't stick around to see the outcome.....
Yeah, I was wondering that Art. I believe TJ's B'room furniture is white, mine's dark wood so that get's the monkey off of my back.......
Monkey...now there's a monkey?
Dang Wayne, I was trying to be subtle about the monkey....... Now everyone knows!

Hmmmm, a couple jugs of Glen's Gramma's "secret" recipe, "Fuzzy Handcuffs", and now, a "monkey"??????????????  Is this a fishing get-together, or.................................???????  Guess I will find out soon enough,  But, I don't wanna run into that monkey. He'll probably outdrink me.  OR,  do you only "See" the "monkey" after sipping some of Glen's rocket fuel??????????
I understand one of the lads got to watch the grass grow up close after drinking some ...so who knows???
Do ya think you can keep up Pete?
I'll suck your wake any day
Twenty boats pointed east and one pointed west.  I'm in as long as Wayne uses his kicker !!
I'll race you all day Wayne..one condition...we each only get five gallons of gas for the race.
Based on what I saw on the Smart Craft gauge at WOT...that should last me about 10 minutes. Guess I'd better use the kicker....
Okay Wayne I changed my impeller and got a new prop I should be good for an extra 60mph Pink Slips
Hows about a little follow the leader type of game in the boats?Anyone?? Joe
Ill supply the sound system!!
Sheesh. Lucky Team Dietz can't be there.  We'd lap the field before the first cast.
LOL NO deal with you and your brother Relic drivin that jet boat.

Lets see on the big boat with both motors running at optimum rpms of 3000 and 27 mph I will  see you in 7 and 1/2 miles out of gas. I am pretty sure though it will be the best 15 min you had on the water.   Art
15 mins. eh?... doesn't sound like much of a ride to me...you got devices... or what???
you no what they say about expensive male toys  compensating for something

You dont understand for the 15 min u get to listen to twin 318 roaring and go below to the refrigerator and get a beer legally ( boats with heads in the states can serve beer ) and get to pee into a porcelin toilet whats not to love???   By the size of my compensation thinggy I must have got the boat for free then  .   Art

Sometimes in life we just have to take the bad with the good. After seeing my surgeon yesterday and my GP today I won't be able to make Lakair this year.  With all the setbacks I've had with infections as well as the drains I still have in me ( and will for the next few weeks yet ) it's not worth the risk.  When you look forward to a trip all fall winter and spring and then can't go it's a bummer.  I wish all of the OFC'RS going the best, have lots of fun, catch lots of fish and with any luck I'll see you all next year.

Sorry to hear your not gonna be joining us this year Gary, your always a great addition to the group, but it's better to concentrate on getting your health back.  I just hope Amy's not too upset about missing out on the trip, she enjoys it as much as anyone.

Well send Amy up Gary...she's healthy ! Sorry to hear you can't make it, but in all honesty you know you're making the right decision. Guess we'll have to arrange something else on that Sealine reel I promised I'd buy off you when you arrived. NO big deal...I surely don't need it to get thru the season and I don't wanna bother you with it now...just concentrate on getting healthy!
Gonna miss you Gary but you know you have to do the right thing.Get healthy and come see us next year! Joe
Dang the luck eh?...I was looking forward to introducing you to our friend Jack (Nanook)...but you gotta do what's best for your health...  Take care and get well...
Dammit man!!! Was really looking forward to seeing you and Amy again!  Please take care of yourself and Get Well Soon!!!...and I'm looking forward to seeing y'all next year!
Sorry to hear you are no going to make it this year Gary... But better to be safe than  sorry thats for sure.. take care of Amy also and we will try to get out your way this year

Twin MOPARS, a fridge with beer, and a ships head!!!.. life don't get much better than that!!!... unless somebody gave ya the boat for free because they felt sorry for ya 'cause ya got's a "nanorod" thinggy!

Thanks for all the kind words...I asked Amy if she wanted to go up alone but her drivers license requires a licensed driver to be with her and without me going she's kind of stuck at home.  She's also afraid no one will be able to make her homemade dog food the way I do.
Sorry to hear you wont be coming I hope everything works out well for you
Gary, you will definately be missed  So sorry you can't come.  We'll be thinking about you, heck, we'll even catch a fish in your honour  Joey
Anyone looking for shared accommodations for this weekend please see post on the main board.  Tom
Dang Tom, I just figured out what they meant by new meat and I would be concerned too..........
Proboat, you have an e-mail

Hello Everyone i am really excited to go it will be my first time but i dont have a pace to stay but i have a 18 foot with plenty of room. If anybody with a campsite is looking for a ride or partner i will be happy to offer a spot in exchange for a place to camp. Please drop me a line if interested thanks in advance Mike
Yer as sharp as a Bowling Ball.. aintcha Bubba?
Takes us Northern Boys a while to cotton on Glen............
BOY! I say BOY! That ain't no chicken....where's your head son?
BOY! I say BOY! That ain't no chicken....where's your head son?  Fog Horn Leg Horn I believe
Thanks Bud, I knew Roy wasn't completely insane............

How could you question Roys sanity.........we all know he is insane.  I do believe that Glen and I might take a SHINE to good old Tom. Nothin better than a man with a shine hangover when he thought he only drank a pepsi. That stuff is clear as water and tasteless tom so you will never know when you have been spiked by the Southern Contingincy.   I aint sure whats going to be more fun Tom or the fishin. Anyone takin bets???  Art

WWHHOOAAHHH,....................UUMMMM..........ERRR...................................... HUH???????????    You(Art),........ AND Glen,............. might take a......... "SHINE"............. to me(shudder).  Whazzit yer tryin to say, n yer own werds???

well its just...... well.......... see.........ahhh.........we like to get Ca-nooks drunk and well then......uhhh..... watch them stumble around and crawl up the stairs and pass out on the floor. But we have been deprived of the real joy that happens and that is the next mornin when they wake up lookin like they had run thru a wringer and put away wet. The bonus is when they don't know that they are drunk because they had a beer or two and decided to switch to Pepsi because they did not want to get to messed up. Well thats were I come in because I will distract you while Glen pours a big old slug of liquid hangover into your can when you ain't seeing it and bang you are on the way to being our favorite comedian. Pretty sick huh??? or you will be.........   signed  Glen's Accomplice
Look at that face in my Avatar, I would never do a thing like that... I'm, Brave Loyal, trustworthy.... hey look what Art's doin' over there Tom???!!!
... here! Quick! Drink this!!!
Am I going to have to be a referee for the 3 other stooges in our cabin?Art Tom and Dawg,nyuk,nyuk,nyuk.

Here we are ... just a shade over three weeks to go.  Gave good old Bass Pro a call tonite and ordered two auto/manual inflatable PFD's, the re-arming kits, and my bug suit.   Of course, during this spending frenzy, I had to call Musky Tackle on-line to pick up a couple depth raiders and a couple 9" grandmas.  Dang this hobby is getting expensive  ... now to go tell the better half.    Ha Ha ... she's great.  Letting me come up a couple days earlier ...  hope to get there on Sunday now.

Just read all these posts...  God, you guys make me nervous!....   a lot of funny talk going on....!!!  I am happy to report that, as the start of fishing here on May 19, the walleyes have been on a good bite and so the pike... some really nice chunky pike have been caught the last few days...  some pike 30+" and thick all the way through.... only last evening a crew came in with four walleyes, lined up on the dock, all 25-inches+... that's an unusal event here as our fish are generally much smaller... and they're hitting on worms already... erie-dearies...  Just a note to help us out... when you arrive in camp.. please come up and register so we know who's all here (helps when the wife calls looking for the key to the car).....  Also: we have a 4-bdrm cottage, sitting empty, that can sleep up to eight.  If anyone is interested in bunking in with new (OFC) friends... give me a call....  Please call ahead or email, if you are interested in evening meals to help us plan our food inventory...  Leslie and I are looking forward to seeing everyone once again (and it sounds like there'll be a few new faces too)............  its going to be fun!  the capt
You're gunna be serving us dinner at the cabins??? WOOOOOOHOOOOOOOO! What are you wearing?

Dont be nervous Keven,you already know most of us and we aint hurt no one yet.Glad the fish are biting hope the bugs ain't.You know how to get in touch with us if you need anything else from the south.Might have a line on a used pump for a back up. Joe
Nothing too frilly I hope!.. don't wanna lose my appetite for that good cookin' Miss Leslie does!!!

I'd been avoiding this thread since I knew that I would be frustrated, but couldn't resist any longer while watching the post count start to accelerate as the day approaches.  Tjsa, the rednecks and coonasses are great folks to fish with, and to share a refreshing, sparkling beverage, too.  Dawg's gramma's medicine is a caution, however.

I hear ya douG, I've been missing this trip ever since I knew it existed as it falls on my wife's birthday, we should get a petition going to move it earlier or later by 1 weekend.  I keep harassing her to spend her birthday there but she says 'it's just a bunch of old men going fishing and drinking'  I respond with...'and your point...?'  Oh and Capt...I'll see you the weekend of Sept 22/23  Tony

So Im thinking maybe just a brain fart but anyway is it possible to have a shot gun start for the pike tourney this year at Lakair it would make for some cool photos I think Just a thought Peter Im starting to vibrate
Glenn Close is coming?

Lew: It's gonna be good to see you and the rest of the gang too!   Slowpoke: That Bermuda Triangle trip really did a number on ya... didn't it Bubba?   It's gonna be great to have a whole week of nothin' but  and more
Looking forward to seeing our Southern friends again....  John
WHY, lol  give me sum info, I am gonna be spending time wit dem in a cabin, I need all the ammo I can get, lol

Its gonna be more of the same ol' in that cabin Tom.....you will figger it out! Joe Edited to read:  Reminds me of a joke about a Yuppie (Tom) who made a ton of money in the stock market in the city.  One day he cashed out and moved way out into the sticks. It was a 10-mile drive to the gas station and 15 to the post office and grocers. He lived on 150 acres, went into town once a week, and was at peace with his world.  After a few months there was a knock at his door. He looked out and there was a fat, scruffy-bearded redneck in sweats on his porch.  The Yuppie was happy to see someone and invited him in. The redneck said "Howdy neighbor, my name is Art and I'm from just up the road and I would like to invite you to a party." The Yuppie was happy to meet a neighbor and said, "I'd love to attend."  Art said, "I got to warn you that there may be some drinkin' going on at this party."  Tom thought back to his power three-martini lunches and figured that he could hold his liquor as well as any man and said, "no problem."  Art said "I got to warn you that there might be some fightin' at the party."  Tom thought to himself that he has never had a problem getting along with people and if push come to shove he had spent a lot of time at the gym making deals and was in pretty good shape so he said, "no problem."  Art then said, "I got to tell you that there may be some sex there too."  Tom perked up at this statement cause he had been in the country for a while without a woman's touch and said, "I will be there! What should I bring and what should I wear?"  Art replied, "Nothin fancy, just gonna be you and me!" +++ Looking forward to meeting you, Tom.
Uh, Oh, ..........yeah, more of the "same ol" but since this is my first time, what exactly is the "same ol'"  I wanna figger it out "WELL BEFORE" I get there,
Guess you will have to wait an see Tom,once up there.  But I would watch out for the REDNECKS:D  Steve
Come to think of it, there was some strange sounds comin out of that cabin last year... as it was Dawgs first year. Guess you'z the new meat this year Tom.
Why you think douG won't come this year???
Because he doesn't want to win the "Deliverance" trophy two years in a row?
NEW MEAT!!!!! Whadda ya mean "NEW MEAT", explain please????

Relax Tom, ya won't feel a thing after we get a few liquid tranquilizers in ya... er ... uh... I mean ya won't remember a thing... no that's not right either... we're gonna have a real good time... yeah that's it!  We're gonna have a real good time Tom!
Tom.this is only on a need to know  and you will know once you arrive Bud,,,and after the few dats up..you will know  Steve
Just make sure you bring your banjo Tom  And a steel cup so the moonshine doesn't eat through the plastic  Joey
Your not ticklish are you Tom?
Anyone hear from Bcanuck or Ruth and Deg, hopefully they'll be able to make the trip as well.  Maureen

Brian has started a new career and doesn't think he can make it but you know how he is...he may just show up anyway!Last I heard Ruth and Don were in but haven't heard from him in a while.He still reads the board so he may reply. Joe
I talked to Don awhile back and he said that him and Ruth had made reservations so I'm pretty sure they will be there. Heck someone needs to stay sober Opps did I say that out loud
Thanks guys, I hope Brian is doing well...kinda miss seeing him post...Don and Ruth too...it'll be good to see them...  Maureen

Well, THAT clears things up,..................NOT!!!!!!!!!!    I think the "banjo" would be provided by the southern contingent, regretfully, lol. And the closest that shine is gonna get to me, is if someone asks me to top up "their" cup.    T'all depends on what I am being "tickled" with. I am sharing a bedroom with the redneck after all, lol.  Thank the Lord Almighty above, that there is a couch there.   p.s.: I am still "concerned" about that "NEW MEAT" comment. I appeal to everyone who was there last year.................................HELP!!!!!
No worries Tom, Art and I snore but the redneck sleepwalks..and talks. Joe
Oh yeah, nigths of the living dead, lol.
At least he claims that he is sleepwalking!
If I could only learn how to sleepfish.... I might catch something!!!
Ohhhhhhhhhhhhhh, you guys are just filling me with confidence, lol.
Just don't follow me and Whopper! We have no idea where the fishies are....
Don't worry Irishfield, I will be following right behind you and your new boat...     (just don't cut the rope until we get there)
That's just not right
LOL Paul !  And Phil knows at least one spot...   Well maybe two...

Yer gonna get the chance to find out "up close and personal" about my "lily white self", And whadda ya mean about not catching any fish? I'll be in the boat, remember?? Along with my sonar unit. We should catch something, hopefullya few 'ol marble eyes.  Thinking it will be wednesday, but possibly thursday I get there. I will pack on the weekend before, to make sure I have lots of time, and don't forget anything. Would supremely suck to forget my OFC Jacket, lol.
Hey Tom, really great to hear you've finally decided to join us for the OFC event of the year.  Guaranteed your gonna luv it & we'll see you in a few weeks !!
Does this Pike make my hands look big???
Your just wishing you could catch one like that dawg
Beats what he caught out of the same boat...but I guess that was the guides fault.

Cant wait!  Bly and I have our campsite booked.  We'll be there Friday afternoon and leaving Sunday afternoon.  Really looking foward to meeting fellow OFNers and having a great time.  Babysitting is all worked out....now if we could only convince them to hold on to them for a few more days....LOL

Will be great to meet some new OFNers and see some of the old one again.Last year lots of people brought stuff for the prize table for the tourney and there were some great prizes.If you have stuff that would make a good prize,bring it along. Joe
Dat's a  good idea Joe. I'll see if I can find a few things too.
Like a flame job on a stickbait for my rear view mirror??? Joe
....I'm certainly looking forward to another great OFC weekend. I should be there Thursday through to Monday.
Geeeze Roy...  I hope you don't donate that lovely birthday present we gave you when you visited our place...    Did you get a photo of the present?...I don't seem to have one.
Dang that's a nice pic for me, Norm. Brings back some great memories. So nice to see J, Jack, Maribeth, yourself and smiling Lew in there.

I'll be there on Wed. the 20th and Beans will arrive the next day, and we'll head for home on Sunday.  Looking forward to yet another great year....thank goodness for my mom the only person willing and brave enough to move into my zoo so I can go away  Maureen
Dang Roy that pic makes you look tall!    Of course I don't have any room to talk
I just tried to call our reservations in ,but got the machine.......We'll be there Tuesday till monday.....See ya's all there....TC and tight lines .......Chuck and Shelley.....
Glad to hear you and Shelly are going to make it up again Chuck, looking forward to seeing you both.  Maureen
Good to see that your gonna make it up for more than a day at a time this year Mo... Looking forward to seeing you too...
sounds like alot of fun if im up that way i will try to stop in for a days fishing with the boys

Flight... booked and paid for!  Rental car... booked and reserved!  Motel room in TO. ... booked and reserved!!!  Deposit for Lakair stay.. the check is in the mail!  OK, I'm ready!!!... is it June yet?
Close Glen...Close...just a few more sleeps bud!
Gonna be good to see you again Glen !!

Here ya go kids...the event this year will likely be the biggest yet. Should be 50 or so people there..maybe more. It takes place on and around the weekend of June 22-24th. Some will be there even earlier, some will stay longer. Please reply if you're going and where you are staying. There may be space available with others, so make sure you ask if you need it. Also remember that if you bunk with someone to pay your fair share and if you get a boat (or ride) with someone to pay your fair share there as well.

I will be there with my wife from Monday the 18th to Monday the 25th. I will figure out how to get her "fair share" out of her during the week in Cottage 7 !  Hope to have numerous OFC'rs out on the water with me, as Leah won't fish every day, and we'ze got a bit of room even if she does.

Paul and I will be there from Friday, June 22 through to July 1st.  We will be camping, hopefully in our regular spot.  I can't wait now.  Its nice to look forward to something   as we all toil away at work  I'll start packin now  Joey

I will be arriving on Wednesday morning with Baby Herc.  We're staying in a one bedroom cottage, can't remember the number, but its not on the water.  I will be leaving Friday for my 33rd  Annual Bass Opening at Lake W. but BabyHerc will be staying the weekend with a buddy of his. Can't wait!
I have a couple hundred square feet reserved in 'Tent City' and a slip for the floating tackle box.  Another teaser ......

7 1/2 weeks to go and I'm drooling.....have already gone through all of the spots that I passed by last year and wished that I hadn't. Sooooo much water, so little time.  I'll be riding shotgun this year so when we get up there really depends on my "drivers" work schedule...
Just 'a bit' huh?  Tony
I wonder if Kevin's started extending a dock yet ?
Wonder if there is any room left at the camping area!     Guess I should probably check?    Whopper  Might as well add some pics
I'll be in my usual spot  early Tuesday morning and will probably head home on Sunday.
Its your year this year Lew... I can feel it...  Ill be there,.... likely from Thursday till Sunday...

I'll be there the Monday or Tuesday before and leaving Sunday. I'll be renting one of the cedar strips from Kevin and getting skunked as usual  . I'll be staying with the Plumma brothers in the Southern Contingency Fortress! I've heard that we may be letting a Lilly white Hoser (TJSA) stay with us, if he'll show this time.  I'm really looking forward to seeing everybody again and meeting new OFNCers. I often daydream about this at work.... being out on beautiful Lake Nippissing... not catching any fish... and coming back in and partying with all the great people of this board!!! Who could ask for anything more???... except to maybe catch a fish  , but the fishin' is only part of it.
